_description: Gospel for Friday following Fourth Sunday after the Octave of Epiphany, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: It bitid opon a dayAls iesus crist went in þe way…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …To tak goddes tilth es noght inoghAnd seþin lightly to leue þe plogh
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dixit quidam ad iesum sequor te.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi proxima Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 35rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.296-298.
